de.upb.cs.swtpra_04.qwirkle.model.lobby

Class LobbyGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.upb.cs.swtpra_04.qwirkle.model.lobby.LobbyGame

  • public class LobbyGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is used to represent a game within the lobby. It holds data provided by the server to use with the RecyclerView.

      • LobbyGame

        public LobbyGame(int id,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 int curPlayerCount,
                 int maxPlayerCount,
                 de.upb.swtpra1819interface.models.GameState state,
                 de.upb.swtpra1819interface.models.Configuration config)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        id - id of the game
        name - name of the game
        curPlayerCount - how many players are in the game right now
        maxPlayerCount - how many players are allowed in this game
        state - what state the game currently is in (e.g. running, ended, ...)
        config - configuration of the game
